name: Wrestling Revolution Mayhem 3D
description:
Welcome to Cage Wrestling. It is time for deathmatch in a cage. This game offers multiple fighting experiences to fans in this realistic game of wrestling.

Enjoy the tag team wrestling combined. Get your hands on your favorite wrestlers around the world in this ring and train your wrestlers for the finest tournament.

Become the undisputed champion of wrestling after beating all tag team champion wrestlers in the world.

Main Features:

Tag Team Wrestling
Cage Wrestling
Smooth and intuitive controls
Stunning & High-Quality 3D Graphics
Amazing 3D Wrestling Environment
Different Characters to select you Player
